Plot: A New York writer on sex and love is finally getting married to her Mr. Big. But her three best girlfriends must console her after one of them inadvertently leads Mr. Big to jilt her.
Title: Sex and the City
Writer: Michael Patrick King, Candace Bushnell (book), Darren Star (television series creator)
Actors: Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis, Cynthia Nixon
tomatoConsensus: Sex and the City loses steam in the transition to the big screen, but will still thrill fans of the show.
